text: Prayikkara Pappan is a 1995 Indian Malayalam-language film directed by T. S. Suresh Babu and written by Shaji Pandavath. The film stars Murali, Chippy, Geetha, Surendra Pal and Jagadish. The film's score was composed by S. P. Venkatesh. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Murali as Achuthan / Prayikkara Pappan *Chippy as Radha *Geetha as Gauri *Jagadish as Shivan *Madhu as Sankunni Mooppan *Raghavan as Kanaran *Sukumaran as DFO James Antony *Vijayakumar as Chandran *Aliyar as Alavikutty *Bheeman Raghu as Parunthu Vavachan *Chithra as Sarasu *Ganesh Kumar as Thomas *Kollam Thulasi as Politician *Kuthiravattam Pappu as Ponnaran *Mamukkoya as Veerappan *Sabnam *Santhakumari as Gouris's mother *Meghanathan as Gunda *Abu Salim as Gunda *Sonia as Katthu *Kaladi Jayan as Pavithran *Kaldi Omana as Thomas's mother *Indrans as Vettukili *Kumarakam Raghunath as Achuthan's father/Sreedharan *Surendra Pal as Thekkan/Palani ==Production== T. S. Suresh Babu had Mohanlal in mind for the role of Prayikkara Pappan, but as writer Shaji Pandavath had already talked with Murali who was interested in playing the part, he was cast.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lpprf-R-fds ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by S.
